Name: The Flo Ziegfeld
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: The original recipe omits sugar but was probably made with sweetened pineapple juice.
History: Named after Florenz Ziegfeld, the Broadway Impresario, whose widow released the recipe for the 1946 Stork Club Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of The Flo Ziegfeld contains 174 calories
